name: IIM Kashipur
description: The institute commenced operations in July 2011 with a vision to become, over the next 10 years, one of the top business schools in India developing leaders who can perform globally. The fraternity diligently follows the core values of mutual respect, lifelong learning, the pursuit of excellence, transparency, and integrity.
features: Best mix of academic and industrial experiences
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: We aspire to achieve excellence in management education by using innovative teaching methods.
ShortDescription: The Indian Institute of Management Kashipur is set up with the mission to drive academic excellence using innovative teaching methods, promoting research and practice of sustainable leadership.

Highlights.name: Core Values
Highlights.description: The institute's core values are collegiality, transparency, green consciousness, and pro-active engagement with all stakeholders [1]. This suggests that IIM Kashipur is committed to creating a collaborative and supportive learning environment, being open and accountable in its operations, and promoting environmental sustainability.

Highlights.name: Strategic Goals
Highlights.description: IIM Kashipur's strategic goals include improvement of the academic ecosystem, synergy between educational theory, practice and research, and promotion of innovation, entrepreneurship and public service [1]. This suggests that the institute is focused on providing a high-quality education that is both theoretical and practical, and that prepares students to be successful in the business world.

enhanced_description: IIM Kashipur, established in July 2011, is a leading Indian business school focused on management education and developing global leaders through innovative teaching methods. Its mission emphasizes academic excellence, research promotion, and sustainable leadership practices. The institute is guided by core values such as mutual respect, lifelong learning, pursuit of excellence, transparency, integrity, collegiality, green consciousness, and pro-active stakeholder engagement. Strategic goals include enhancing its academic ecosystem, ensuring synergy between educational theory, practice, and research, and fostering innovation, entrepreneurship, and public service.
